Comment.value:
Class Customizations:

Level 15: Greater Smiting.

Level 20: Divine Wrath 2 uses per day.

Level 25: Greater Smiting.

Level 30: Divine Wrath 3 uses per day.

Level 35: Smite becomes effective vs all alignments.

Level 40: Divine Wrath 4 uses per day.

Level 45: Greater Smiting.


Feat Customizations:

Divine Wrath:  
Duration: Charisma Modifier + 1 per 10 Divine Champion Levels in rounds.
Attack Bonus: 3 + 2 per 5 Divine Champion Levels after 5.
Damage Bonus: 3 + 2 per 5 Divine Champion Levels after 5 of Positive Damage.
Save Bonus: 3 + 2 per 5 Divine Champion Levels after 5.
Temporary Hit Points: +4 per Divine Champion Level.

Smite Evil: 
In addition to the damage dealt, the target will receive a 10% vulnerability to positive damage for 5 rounds.
